<p><em>[adjective][species]</em> may be the best place for furry non-fiction and opinion writing, but it's not the only place. In recent weeks we have been blessed with some outstanding pieces published around the traps, which I would like to share with you here:</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="http://www.hoodedutilitarian.com/2014/09/some-notes-on-contemporary-furry-affairs/">Some Notes on Contemporary Furry Affairs</a> by Michael Arthur over on <em>Hooded Utilitarian</em>. It's an intelligent and critical look at Scar (subtitle: <em>A One Night Stand with the Lion Queen</em>), Rocket Raccoon, and Bojack Horseman.</li>
<li><a href="http://notwithabang.com/post/96879328026/rob-checks-his-privilege">Rob Checks His Privilege</a> on Rob Baird's blog. Rob is a furry writer, talking about creating and consuming "problematic" art and porn.</li>
<li><a href="http://dogpatchpress.wordpress.com/2014/08/24/frolic-neonbunny/">An Interview with Neonbunny</a>, by Patch over on Dogpatch Press, following Neonbunny from San Francisco counterculture to his promotion of furry nightclub Frolic.</li>
</ul>
<p>Enjoy!</p>
